message.entry: Unsupported value for trainingOptions 'Plots' Name/Value. Only 'none' is supported.
Unsupported value for trainingOptions 'WorkerLoad' Name/Value. WorkerLoad vector must have all equal values.
Unsupported value for trainingOptions 'BatchNormalizationStatistics' Name/Value. The value 'population' is not supported.
Unsupported value for trainingOptions 'ResetInputNormalization' Name/Value. Only false is supported.
Cannot perform parallel or multi-gpu training when 'DispatchInBackground' is true in trainingOptions.
Unsupported value for trainingOptions 'OutputNetwork' Name/Value. Only 'last-iteration' is supported.
The trainingOptions 'MiniBatchSize' value must be greater than or equal to the number of workers in the parallel pool. Use parpool function to set the value for number of workers.
trainingOptions must include 'ValidationData' when 'OutputNetwork' is set to 'best-validation-loss'.
metric {0} supplied in trainingOptions failed to initialize. Check to make sure this metric is valid for use in this trainer.
metric {0} supplied in trainingOptions is not valid for use in this trainer. Only metrics authored by MathWorks are supported.

entry.note: Do not translate ValidationPatience, variable name in trainingOptions
Hole is a user specified metric name

message.entry: When trainingOptions metrics specify validation-only metrics, ValidationData must be specified. {0} is a validation-only metric.
